Hero.title: Hello I`m
Hero.description: Fullstack web developer, React, NextJs, and Python developer

About.title: About Me
About.description: I`m a FullStack web developer with a passion for creating interactive and responsing web applications. I have experience working with: React,NextJs,Javascript,Typescript,Node,Express,HTML,CSS,Python,MogoDB, PostgreSQL, Git. I am a quick learner and i`m always looking to expand my knowledge and skill set. i am a team player and i`m excited to work with others to create amazing applications

Contact.title: Let`s Connect
Contact.info: I`m currently looking for new opportunities, my inbox is always open. whether you have a question, or just want to say hi, I`ll try my best to get back to you.
